surgerydetails.line1: Every Saturday 10.30am – 11.30am at Pop In, The Blue, Rockgrove Way, Market Square, London SE16

surgerydetails.line3: Dear Resident
surgerydetails.line4: We are writing to let you know that we will be visiting the Setchell Estate as part of our Grange ward mobile surgery programme.
surgerydetails.line5: This is an opportunity to raise any local issue of concern which you have with us. These issues can be about any service which the Council provides or which affect your local environment. We will always do our best to help you when we can.
surgerydetails.line6: We will be in your area on Saturday 23rd January between 11am and 3pm
surgerydetails.line7: Please feel free to contact us before or at any time about any local issue which you are concerned about. Our contact details are:

Residents will be notified by letter in advance of the date, time and specific streets/roads where the surgery will take place. Surgeries are not held in August, on Bank Holidays, Easter or in Christmas Week.
surgerydetails.line2: MOBILE SURGERY SCHEDULE – 2016/2017
surgerydetails.line3: Saturday 5th March 2016
surgerydetails.line4: East Dulwich Estate: Wilton, Whitney, Walcot, Wheatland, Whaddon, Tidworth,
surgerydetails.line5: Riseholme, Melbreak and Ledbury Houses. Mary Seacole House, Dog
surgerydetails.line8: Denmark Hill – Denmark Hill 155-159: Blanchedowne, Torrens, Cross, Mayhew, Shaftsbury and
surgerydetails.line11: Denmark Hill: Matlock Court, Crossthwaite Ave, Sunray Ave, Hillcrest, Gylcote Close, Nairne
surgerydetails.line14: Denmark Hill: Dylways, Morris Court, Perth and Tayside Courts, Turner Court, Hunter Court and
surgerydetails.line17: Ivanhoe, Bromar, Malfort and Grove Hill Roads.
surgerydetails.line19: Champion Hill Estate: Appleshaw, Birsdall, Holderness, Leconfield and Seavington Houses.
surgerydetails.line20: Champion Hill 40-52, Champion Hill 25-47, Langford Green, 2-8 Dog Kennel Hill
surgerydetails.line22: Muschamp Road, Marsden Road, Oglander Road, Maxsted Road, Bellenden Road, 165-279 and
surgerydetails.line25: Grove Vale 2-6 and 19-113 ONLY. East Dulwich Road SE22 64-126 ONLY, Adys Road 4-100

surgerydetails.line1: Your locally elected Liberal Democrat councillors will be holding a mobile surgery programme in the Surrey Docks area to enable residents to raise any local issues. Residents will be notified of the date, time and specific streets/roads where the surgery will take place by letter a week in advance.
surgerydetails.line2: Your councillors can also be contacted by phone or e-mail for appointments and/or visits to discuss issues on one-to-one basis.
surgerydetails.line3: Surgeries are not held in August, on bank holidays, Easter or in Christmas week.

surgerydetails.line1: Your locally elected Liberal Democrat councillors will be holding a mobile surgery programme in the Surrey Docks area to enable residents to raise any local issues. Residents will be notified of the date, time and specific streets/roads where the surgery will take place by letter a week in advance.
surgerydetails.line2: Your councillors can also be contacted by phone or e-mail for appointments and/or visits to discuss issues on one-to-one basis.
surgerydetails.line3: Surgeries are not held in August, on bank holidays, Easter or in Christmas week.

surgerydetails.line1: Your locally elected Liberal Democrat councillors will be holding a mobile surgery programme in the Surrey Docks area to enable residents to raise any local issues. Residents will be notified of the date, time and specific streets/roads where the surgery will take place by letter a week in advance.
surgerydetails.line2: Your councillors can also be contacted by phone or e-mail for appointments and/or visits to discuss issues on one-to-one basis.
surgerydetails.line3: Surgeries are not held in August, on bank holidays, Easter or in Christmas week.

surgerydetails.line1: A mobile surgery will be held on the first Thursday of every month 6.30pm - 7.30pm
surgerydetails.line2: Static Surgeries:
surgerydetails.line3: First Saturday of every month 10.00am - 11.00am at Pelican Estate T&RA Hall, Lyndhurst Way/Grummant Road, London SE15
surgerydetails.line4: Second Saturday of every month 10.00am - 11.00am at Rye Lane Chapel, 59a Rye Lane, Peckham, London SE15 5EX.
surgerydetails.line5: Fourth Thursday of every month 7.00pm - 8.00pm at Consort Estate T&RA Hall, Philip Walk London SE15
surgerydetails.line6: For urgent enquiries, The Lane Ward Councillors can be contacted by e-mail.
surgerydetails.line7: Surgeries are not held in August, on bank holidays, Easter or in Christmas week.
